entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
